permissions: Allowed for admins. Non-admins can delete only when they are a manager member of the material supplier or a member of its broker; deletion is denied if the material supplier is blank.
side_effects: Deletes the material type if allowed; also removes related associations (rate material types, material site supply/dump links, shift constraints, and shift scope material type references) before destroy.
validation_notes: --confirm is required. Material types in use may not be deletable; deletion fails when the server reports cannot-delete reasons.
